mapper.select: SELECT EMAIL, NICKNAME, AUTH FROM MEMBER WHERE DEL != 1 AND EMAIL = #{email} AND PASSWORD = #{password}
SELECT CATEGORY FROM MEMBER_CATEGORIES MEMBER_CATE, CATEGORY CATE WHERE MEMBER_CATE.CATEGORY_SEQ = CATE.CATEGORY_SEQ AND MEMBER_CATE.EMAIL = #{email}
mapper.insert: insert into MEMBER(EMAIL, PASSWORD, NICKNAME, AUTH, SIGNUP_TYPE, REG_DATE, MARKETING_AGREE) values(#{email}, #{password}, #{nickname}, #{auth}, #{signup_type}, sysdate, #{marketing_agree})
